title: Account Hacked

embed.description: I was playing fine ytd, And I just brought Kayn and ready for the icon trial. And today When I try Login to League, It got me suspended! WTF? and when i login to lol.com, i find out my account email got changed to some sort of ***@163.com WTF?!

body:
Today I tried to log in to play League and found that my account has been banned. I was informed on the login screen that I could find the reason for my ban if I checked my Email. When I did check my email I was unable to find any email from Riot informing me of why I was banned.

I sent in a ticket to riot about the issue and am waiting to hear a reply back.

I checked my account information and found that my email has been changed to a 163 email. This is obviously not my email I signed up with and when I went to try and change my email it informed me that a verification is being sent to the new email that I never changed to. The same thing happened when I attempted to change my password back as well.

I was never given an email from riot to even request a change to begin with for my PW or Email. Yet now all my information has been swapped over to a new email and pass without my confirmation.

I have found that other users have been having the same issue as of yesterday with the same email being used to steal accounts. I have provided a link to another issue that a user faced identical to mine with the same culprit.

Please riot, help me out. I love your game and I spend a lot on skins cause I love collecting. I would love to play with my friends again, so please help a girl out.

replies.body: We can help!  Submitting a ticket (hopefully an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416)) was the best step to take.  Our account team can help update your info, recover the account, and assist with reparations.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check the status for you.
